column1: Westemnet was the westernmost grasslands of Rohan beyond Entwash that spread until the rivers Isen
column2: marking the western part of the land of the Riddermark.

column1: The most important of Rohans settlements and fortifications lay to the south of the Westemnet
column2: where the White Mountains rose up from the plain. Helms Deep was among these
column3: and to the south-east was the seat of the Kings of Rohan
